section.title: NAPI: Java Application Programming Interface
section.para: The NeXus Java API provides NeXus data file access to programs written in the Java programming language. This API was implemented by Java code calling the original C language NeXus API through the Java Native Methods Interface.

section.title: On-line Documentation
section.para:
The following documentation is browsable online:
The NeXus for Java API general instructions including installation notes, instructions for running NeXus for Java programs and a brief introduction to the API.
The Doxygen API documentation
http://download.nexusformat.org/doxygen/html-java/
A verbose tutorial for the NeXus for Java API.
The API Reference.
Finally, the source code for the test driver for the API which also serves as a documented usage example.

section.title: Acknowledgement
section.para: All the code for number type conversion has been taken from the Java HDF Interface library provided by NCSA. JHI also served as an inspiration for many aspects of this API. See NCSA's copyright statement for more details. Downloads
